src:
Primera foto de la carita del segundo hijo de Santiago Arias y Karin Jiménez
El pasado 24 de octubre el futbolista del Atlético de Madrid confirmó mediante su cuenta de Instagram el nacimiento del nuevo integrante de su familia.

04 Nov 2019, 20:17

Ahora, para celebrar el cumpleaños de Thiago, su primogénito, el deportista aprovechó para compartir una imagen familiar, en la que se ve por primera vez el rostro de del pequeño Lucca.
En la imagen aparece Santiago cargando a su hijo de 2 años y Karin, su esposa, sosteniendo en brazos al menor de la familia, quien apenas tendría una semana de nacido.
Ante la tierna fotografía, los seguidores del jugador y la modelo aprovecharon para felicitarlos por mantener un armonioso hogar y llenaron de halagos a los dos pequeños.
Esta es la imagen, que ya cuenta con más de 44 mil ‘likes’ en la plataforma:
text:
First picture of the face of the second son of Santiago Arias and Karin Jiménez
On October 24, the Atlético de Madrid footballer confirmed through his Instagram account the birth of the new member of his family.

04 Nov 2019, 20:17

Now, to celebrate Thiago's birthday, his firstborn, the athlete took the opportunity to share a familiar image, in which the face of little Lucca is seen for the first time.
In the image Santiago appears carrying his 2-year-old son and Karin, his wife, holding the youngest of the family in his arms, who was barely a week old.
Before the tender photography, the followers of the player and the model took the opportunity to congratulate them for maintaining a harmonious home and filled the two little ones with flattery.
This is the image, which already has more than 44 thousand likes on the platform:
